name: Barbell Row
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a barbell with an overhand grip. Hinge at the hips and lean forward. Pull the bar to your lower chest/upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Lower with control.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie flat on your back with hands behind your head and legs raised, knees bent at 90 degrees. Bring your right elbow toward your left knee while extending your right leg. Alternate sides in a pedaling motion.

name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells at your sides. Keep your elbows close to your body and curl the weights up to your shoulders. Lower with control.

name: Chin Up
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart. Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, then lower yourself back down with control.

name: Dip
instructions: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms straight. Lower your body by bending your arms until your shoulders are below your elbows. Push back up to starting position.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on your back with arms extended straight up toward the ceiling and legs raised with knees bent at 90 degrees. Slowly lower your right arm overhead while extending your left leg straight, hovering just above the floor. Return to start and repeat on the opposite side. Keep your lower back pressed to the floor throughout.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot. Bend at hips and knees to grasp the bar. Keep your back straight, chest up, and shoulders back. Drive through your heels and hips to lift the bar, keeping it close to your body.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench holding a dumbbell in each hand above your chest with arms extended. Lower the dumbbells to the sides of your chest, then press them back up until arms are straight.

name: Dumbbell Fly
instructions: Lie flat on a bench holding a dumbbell in each hand above your chest, palms facing each other. With a slight bend in your elbows, lower the dumbbells out to the sides until you feel a stretch in your chest, then bring them back together.

name: Dumbbell Incline Bench Press
instructions: Set an incline bench to 30-45 degrees. Sit with your back against the bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level. Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended, then lower them back to the starting position with control.

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing your torso. Keeping your elbows close to your body, curl the weights up while maintaining the neutral grip. Lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Kickbacks
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with knees slightly bent and torso leaning forward. Keep your upper arms close to your torso and extend your forearms back until your arms are straight, then return to start.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing inward. With a slight bend in your elbows, raise your arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Raise
instructions: Bend forward at the hips with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other. Lift the dumbbells out to the sides until they are level with your shoulders, then lower them slowly.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place your right knee and hand on a bench for support, holding a dumbbell in your left hand. Keep your back flat and pull the dumbbell up toward your hip, squeezing your back muscles. Lower with control and repeat on the other side.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs. Keep a slight bend in your knees and hinge at the hips, lowering the dumbbells along your legs while keeping your back straight. Feel the stretch in your hamstrings, then drive your hips forward to return to standing.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Raise
instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Keeping your arms straight with a slight bend in the elbows, lift the weights out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower with control.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward. Press the weights upward until arms are fully extended, then lower back to starting position.

name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on a bench holding two dumbbells with arms extended above your chest. Bend your elbows to lower the dumbbells toward your forehead, then extend your arms back to the starting position.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold a dumbbell vertically close to your chest with both hands cupping the top weight. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower into a squat by pushing your hips back and bending your knees, keeping your chest up. Drive through your heels to return to standing.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Set a bench to a 30-45 degree incline. Lie back holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level. Press the dumbbells up until your arms are fully extended, then lower them back down with control to the starting position.

name: Lunges
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees. Push back to starting position and repeat with the other leg.

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench with your feet firmly planted on the ground. Grip the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Lower the bar to your chest in a controlled manner, then press it back up to full arm extension.

name: Running
instructions: Maintain an upright posture with a slight forward lean. Land on the midfoot and push off with your toes. Keep a steady breathing pattern and maintain a comfortable pace.

name: Pull-up
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms fully extended and hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar. Lower yourself back down with control to full arm extension.

name: Push-up
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulders. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Lower your chest to the ground, then push back up to starting position.

name: Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed out. Keep your chest up and core tight. Lower your body by pushing your hips back and bending your knees until your thighs are parallel to the floor. Drive through your heels to return to starting position.

name: Plank
instructions: Start in a push-up position but rest on your forearms instead of hands. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Hold this position while breathing normally.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height. Press the bar straight up overhead until arms are fully extended. Lower back to starting position with control.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension
instructions: Stand or sit holding a dumbbell with both hands, arms extended overhead. Keep your elbows close to your head and pointed forward. Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending at the elbows, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
